During the 2008 presidential campaign, Mr Barack Obama was critical of indefinite detention for unlawful combatants. And here we are... two-plus years later, and all of those things are there. Not because anyone wants them to be there, but because they were the best solutions, Mr Donald Rumsfeld said.
